sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text:
History:1953 Comp., § 48-22-74, enacted by Laws 1965, ch. 293, § 1; 1975, ch. 330, § 37; 1983, ch. 54, § 1; 1987, ch. 292, § 8; 1989, ch. 209, § 12; 1991, ch. 66, § 1; repealed by Laws 2016, ch. 88, § 1006.

Repeals.— Laws 2016, ch. 88, § 1006 repealed 58-20-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1965, ch. 293, § 1, relating to business of selling negotiable checks, drafts and money orders regulated, effective July 1, 2017. For provisions of former section,seethe 2016 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
